name: Unipocalypse
description: It has been many moons since you encountered another of your kind. You sit alone in your meadow, remembering days long past... Under the pale light of your moon, you realize what you must do... as the new day comes to light, so too does your resolve. You steel your heart in preparation of what you must do. The time has come for the humans to share in your pain. The hunters have become the hunted.
